title: Mod Manifest v1
description: A manifest for mods used in the Helldivers 2 Mod manager

Version.description: The version of the manifest. This tells the manager how to read it.

Guid.description: The global unique identifier of the mod.

Description.description: A short description of the mod.

IconPath.description: A relative path to an image file to be used as a icon for the mod.

Options.description: Defines options for the mod. These can be individually enabled and disabled by the user.

Image.description: Path to an image to associate with this option.

Include.description: Array of paths to folders to always include in this option. (Paths are relative to mod root)

SubOptions.description: Sub-options for the option. Only one can be chosen by the user for each.

Image.description: Path to an image to associate with this sub-option.

Include.description: Array of paths to folders to include in this sub-option. (Paths are relative to mod root)

NexusData.description: Data telling the manager that your mod is from Nexus, thus enabling auto updating.

ModId.description: The ID given to your mod by Nexus.

Version.description: The version of the mod for this manifest.
